verses.roman:
pañcame 'śrī-nityānanda'-tattva nirūpaṇa
nityānanda hailā rāma rohiṇī-nandana

synonyms: pañcame—in the Fifth Chapter; śrī-nityānanda—of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; tattva—the truth; nirūpaṇa—description; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; hailā—was; rāma—Balarāma; rohiṇī-nandana—the son of Rohiṇī.
translation: The Fifth Chapter describes the truth of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu, who is none other than Balarāma, the son of Rohiṇī.
